remarks: Lemma for ~ axc11n .  Change bound variable in an equality. (Contributed by NM, 8-Jul-2016.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 17-Feb-2018.)  Restructure to ease either bundling, or reducing dependencies on axioms.  (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 30-Nov-2019.)
statement:
axc11nlem.1 $e |- ( -. A. y y = x -> ( x = z -> A. y x = z ) ) $.
axc11nlem $p |- ( A. x x = z -> A. y y = x ) $.
$d x z $.
$d y z $.
